attributes.review: So true reason I downloaded this app is to pay respects to the Cheeto man 💁🏽‍♀️ but then when I open the app I am greeted with A FIST and at this point it’s not my first rodeo so I get ready to throw hands but then I exit out of the app then the president SHOW UO NAKED ON MY SCREEN I AM 😯 💄👀 so I don’t rate this at all it is terrible and should be taken off of the apple App Store
attributes.title: I WAS THREATENED

attributes.review: This app is just awful!!! It’s spreading false information and hate speech as far as the eye can see. People’s lives are being hurt by this app and it doesn’t even work right anyways! It kept crashing and is literally the worst app I have ever seen on the App Store. Please remove it!!
attributes.title: Chile... anyways 🥶

attributes.review: It made my phone so slow. I feel like it was controlling my other apps and made the quality of them worse. I do not recommend this app and highly advise others to be cautious if downloading this app for it may create chaos in your phone.
attributes.title: Danger to all phones

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and takes a very long time for it to load. Honestly not worth getting, it takes up so much storage and my phone contracted a virus from this app. I have no idea why people would still want to download this app.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: I downloaded this thinking that I was going to get useful information out of it. However, I get on and now my phone is completely messed up! It’s like a virus has entered my phone! There’s a Cheeto man running across the screen! Whatever you do don’t download this app! It’s cursed!
attributes.title: Spam Curse

attributes.review: OMG DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!  When I got the app on my phone it started lagging and then it put a virus on my phone and I had to get a new phone which I didn’t have money for. And to be honest a lot of people don’t won’t trump as the president we feel like he is making things way worse and he looks like a orange!!!
attributes.title: My facts!

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have seen or have been on in my whole life!! This app hacked my phone and made it all trump stuff and it took a whole month to upload. And when it finally did it got ahold of all my info and they keeps sending me stuff if the mail and I am warning you DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP!!! *DO NOT GET*!!

attributes.review: I got this app so I can support the big orange guy who has a kid named Barron who we must save. This app made me have a fever dream in which all I saw was the color orange and I only could eat oranges. I don’t like oranges. Orange does not pass the vibe check because our big orange president is holding Barron hostage and we must save him. Mr. Orange is not a good man 🎩🤣🙃😄🙃😳😅😅🥃😳😳😄😁✅❤️✅🍏😔👀🍊🍊🍊😡🇺🇸👄🖤🍏

We’re tired of Trump misleading the public and his followers who never fact check him or do anything when he offends others and leaves millions unprotected. I downloaded the app, can say it has been one of the biggest wastes of time of my life. Rate it 1 Star so we can get it taken off of the App Store.
attributes.title: JOE BYEDON

attributes.review:
This app is a total nightmare!!!! When I first downloaded the app it said I would be making in app purchases to something called “a wall” as well as “the KKKs”. If that wasn’t enough it also gave me a virus on my phone that would only go away if I sacrificed my family’s first born child!
DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: Terrible NiGHTMARE
